dialogues.speaker: cat
text: My close friend's birthday is coming up. What would be a good gift?
곧 제 친한 친구 생일입니다. 어떤 선물을 주면 좋겠습니까?
How about a refreshing catnip candy that makes their taste buds tingle just by bringing it near?
살짝 가져다대기만 해도 입천장이 뻥 뚫려버릴 것 같이 상쾌한 야옹푸드 캣닢사탕이 최고죠.
How about a fiber-rich and tangy cat food purée?
식이섬유가 가득한 짭쪼름 야옹푸드 츄르가 어떨까요?
As always, a heartfelt handwritten letter would be great for a birthday.
역시 생일 때는 진심을 가득 담은 손편지가 좋죠.

dialogues.speaker: cat
answer: Catnip candy! So refreshing, I'm curious too.
Cat food purée? Just thinking about it makes my mouth water.
짭조름 츄르! 생각만 해도 군침이 도는군요.
A handwritten letter... I've never written one before, but I should give it a try.
손편지라... 한번도 써본 적 없는데 부끄럽네요. 한번 써봐야겠네요.
